channel.title: [317] My Friend Gets A White Client
channel.description:
Alright, i have port forwarded and the server is running, and when he opens the webclient it just goes white for him?
im giving him the cache and going to see if that works.
do you guys know of anything that would make it work?

item.title: [317] My Friend Gets A White Client
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“XxAndyxX, post:4, topic:437463”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=540171.msg3955934#msg3955934 date=1332745130]
just prob didnt update the display yet. Happens a lot during downloading/unpacking cache.
[/quote]

Once its unpacked this wont happen anymore.[/quote]

It still could, depending on his Ping and computer’s speed

Read full topic
item.source: [317] My Friend Gets A White Client

item.title: [317] My Friend Gets A White Client
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Normally the white should go away if he waits 0-5mins
It’s mostly caused by switching to another tab or minimizing the browser.

Read full topic
